SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssignNode
The AssignNode class represents a node in the code that assigns a value to a variable.
AtomNode
The AtomNode class represents a node in an expression tree that holds a single value.
CodeBlockNode
Composite node: Represents a block of code.
CodeComponent
The common interface for all nodes in the code.
CompilationException
Exception thrown when a compilation error occurs.
ConditionComponent
Represents a condition in the GLS language.
ExprComponent
The ExprComponent interface represents an arithmetic expression component in the code.
ExprCondNode
The ExprCondNode class represents a node in an expression tree that performs a conditional operation on two sub-expressions.
ExprOpNode
The ExprOpNode class represents a node in an expression tree that performs an operation on two sub-expressions.
ForNode
Represents a 'for' loop node in the compiler's abstract syntax tree.
GlsGrammar
Represents the grammar for the GILLES language.
GlsTerminal
Enum representing the terminals in the GILLES language.
GlsVariable
Enum representing the variables in the GILLES language.
IfNode
Represents an if statement node in the compiler's intermediate representation.
ImpliesCondNode
Represents a node in the condition tree that implements the logical implication.
InputNode
Represents an input node in the code generation process.
LabelManager
Manages the generation and allocation of unique labels for while loops and if statements.
LabelManager.IfLabels
Holds the labels for a single if statement.
LabelManager.WhileLabels
Holds the labels for a single while loop.
LexicalAnalyzer
Scanner class, generated by JFlex.
LexicalSymbol
LexicalSymbol objects represent a terminal symbol in the grammar as a state of the lexer.
LexicalUnit
A terminal symbol, a.k.a.
LLVMCodeGenerator
Represents an LLVM code generator for the GLS language.
Main
Main Class
MinusExprNode
Represents a node for a unary minus expression in the abstract syntax tree.
MissingProductionRuleException
Exception thrown when a required production rule is missing during parsing.
OutputNode
Represents an output node in the compiler's code generation phase.
Pair<A,B>
A generic Pair class that holds two objects.
ParenthesisExprNode
Represents an expression node that is enclosed in parentheses.
Parser
The Parser class is responsible for parsing the input tokens using the GLS grammar.
ParseTree
A skeleton class to represent parse trees.
ParsingException
Exception thrown when a parsing error occurs.
PipeCondNode
Represents a node in the condition component that wraps another condition component.
ProductionRule
Represents a production rule in a grammar.
StringBuilderWrapper
A wrapper class for StringBuilder that provides additional functionality for generating code.
Symbol
Represents a symbol in the grammar.
UnexpectedTerminalException
This exception is thrown when an unexpected terminal is encountered during parsing.
VariableManager
Manages variable declarations using a singleton pattern.
WhileNode
Represents a while loop node in the code.
